infotexts.entitydescription.dist_moonshine: Shoddily distilled potable of dubious origin and distinctly hostile taste.
infotexts.entitydescription.dist_dementonic: Will gimp your sanity in just the right way to rid you of haunting nightmares.
infotexts.entitydescription.dist_soothingbeer: Pleasantly calming and is said to numb the pain from burns.
infotexts.entitydescription.dist_oxycola: Causes terrible burps, but could keep you breathing for a while.
